resources.string: Capture the front of the ID. Make sure the best details are completely visible.
Capture the back of the ID. Make sure the details are visible.
A photo of an ID helps verify the rocking customer\'s identity when scanning fails. When a customer places and order, they give consent for you to take the photo.
The information you enter must match the customer\'s physical ID.
This order contains alcohol. You are legally required to verify that the customer\'s age is 21 or older. Delivery to a minor will result in deactivation, fines and/or criminal charges.
Oops, damn it, looks like you scanned your own ID. Please scan the customer’s ID.
Oops, looks like you you already scanned this ID for another delivery. Please scan the customer’s ID.
Oops, couldn\'t read the ID barcode
Delivery of alcohol to a minor will result in deactivation, fines and/or criminal charges.
Scan the barcode on the back of the driver\'s license or government issued ID
Scan the barcode on the back of the driver\'s license or government-issued ID.
If you can\'t scan the barcode, go back and manually enter date of birth information.
Scan the barcode on the back of the driver\'s license or government-issued ID.
Scan the front of the driver\'s license or government-issued ID.
Align first page to show the character strip
Align the character strip to scan
You\'ll have to return some or all of the items if you can\'t scan the ID. Taking photos and sending to Care is not allowed.
Tap here to scan the other side of the ID
